fields.name: Rock
fields.description: A broad genre of popular music characterized by a strong rhythm, simple chord progressions, and often electric guitar-driven sound.

fields.name: Pop
fields.description: Mainstream music with catchy melodies, accessible lyrics, and polished production aimed at a wide audience.

fields.name: Hip Hop
fields.description: A cultural movement and music genre featuring rhythmic spoken lyrics over beats, often exploring social and personal themes.

fields.name: Jazz
fields.description: Improvisation-driven music with swing rhythms, complex harmonies, and roots in African-American communities.

fields.name: Blues
fields.description: A soulful genre originating in the Deep South, characterized by expressive melodies and the twelve-bar chord progression.

fields.name: Country
fields.description: Music rooted in American folk traditions with storytelling lyrics, acoustic instrumentation, and distinctive twang.

fields.name: Electronic
fields.description: Music produced primarily using electronic instruments, synthesizers, and digital audio workstations.

fields.name: Reggae
fields.description: Jamaican music with a distinctive offbeat rhythm, often carrying messages of love, unity, and resistance.

fields.name: Classical
fields.description: A tradition of Western art music encompassing orchestral, chamber, and solo works spanning centuries.

fields.name: Funk
fields.description: Dance-oriented music with groovy bass lines, syncopated rhythms, and a strong backbeat.

fields.name: Soul
fields.description: Emotionally rich music blending gospel, rhythm and blues, and jazz influences.

fields.name: Metal
fields.description: Heavy, aggressive music with distorted guitars, powerful drums, and intense vocals.

fields.name: Punk
fields.description: Fast, rebellious rock music with raw sound, anti-establishment themes, and DIY ethos.

fields.name: R&B
fields.description: Smooth, soulful music blending rhythm and blues with modern pop influences.

fields.name: Folk
fields.description: Acoustic-based music rooted in traditional storytelling and cultural heritage.
